name: Premsagar Yuvak Samajik Sanstha

address: Bhrmha sankul ,Bulding no 3 , A wing , Flat no 103 , Shivajinagar ,

briefDescription: “The Premsagar Yuvak Samajik Sanstha” are working in Thane ,Pune  & Palghar District (Maharashtra) for empowerment of tribal people. From the last five years we have been working in the fields of women empowerment, SHG formation and linkaging, poverty annihilation, eco conservation, watershed management, women counselling  , Youth development started OM Vocational Training  center  etc.
